content:
You decide to ask them for guidance. They tell you that the caves are a place where you can tap into the deepest parts of yourself and find the true voice you never knew existed. They tell you that exploring the caves will be a difficult journey, but it will be worth it in the end. They give you a small lantern and invite you to join them on their exploration.

Do you:

1. Join them and explore the caves
2. Continue exploring the hidden caves
3. Leave the hidden caves

Please select one of the above options by typing the corresponding number.
